title: Sandra Serra
descriptions: She has a degree in Law from the University of Valencia (2007), practicing lawyer belonging to the Bar Association of Valencia (2009).

Master in Corporate Legal Consultancy by the Fundación de Estudios Bursátiles de Valencia (2008-2009), Course of Insolvency Administrator (2009) and Course of International Tax Planning CEF (2015) and Commercial Contracts CEF (2020).

title: Alejandro Toledo
descriptions: He has a Law Degree from the University of Valencia (2001) and is a practicing lawyer, member of the Bar Association of Valencia (2004)

Master in Taxation and Tax Consultancy taught by Centro de Estudios Financieros (CEF), 2005; Master in Legal-Financial Management of the Company, taught by the Polytechnic University of Valencia (UPV) and the Bar Association of Valencia (ICAV) 2011
Professional Master in International Business Management taught by the U.D.I.M.A, 2015.
